properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:52AM EST until February 6 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of
an inch.

* WHERE...Oneida county.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 6 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop tonight, heavy at times
after midnight. Snow will transition to a wintry mix of snow
sleet and freezing rain Thursday morning, which will continue
yet diminish into Thursday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 6 PM EST THURSDAY
